attributes.review: Opened up the app and saw many stupid glitches and no one likes trump anyways so just here doing my part and I also really regret opening and downloading the app but I had to do it in order to leave my review
attributes.title: Stupid

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app my grandma flew out of the window and my dad started praying and I asked why are you praying and he said Noah Schnapps coming we gotta hide but then Noah Schnapp found us and he threw his 399 pound dog at as and made me eat the dog for a satanic ritual. All because of this app so DONT I repeat DONT GET IT!
attributes.title: NO!

attributes.review: This app can give us 4 more years of a horrible president . This app is for  uneducated,ignorant,Hillbillies that support a narcissistic person that stands for racism and sexism, one of the few things that causes him to be a disaster to my country. And I believe “Donny the orange”, is sick in the head and body. 💗😊🥰🥰🧚🏽👑.
attributes.title: Just facts 🧚🏽🧚🏽💗🥰👑

attributes.review: If I could leave it with no stars I would. This app took forever to download. It force quits on its own. It makes my phone slow af along with random glitches. Whoever put this out needs to rethink what they made.
attributes.title: Crappy

attributes.review:
when i opened the app, a smell similar to stinky poo started to emerge from my phone. am i surprised? not really. trump is a stinky. who created this 5D experience though? it really smells like i’m in the same facility as our disgusting president. 
acab, black lives matter, save yemen, settle for biden.
attributes.title: stinky app

attributes.review: I’ve always supported Trump and his campaign, I really hope he wins
attributes.title: Trump 2020, pretty good app

attributes.review: It tools DAYS for me to download the app!! Not only that, but I also needed to go walk my pet cockroach in the lake so I left my phone at home. But, when I got back, I noticed that it started glitching because I was downloading this app!! FOR TWO WHOLE DAYS!!! THIS IS A WARNING!!! DO NOT download the app!!!
attributes.title: GLITCHES

attributes.review: I didn’t like how the app made me include personal information. Ever since then I’ve been getting phone calls from random numbers. I think it’s China. He sells my information to China!!! Not what I look for in a president.
attributes.title: Sells information to China!

attributes.review: I wish i could give 0 stars. The app is always crashing and never works, it supports trump and pushes its oppinion into others. Its disrespectful and shares fake news, you should really “fact check” yourselves. Take this app down. It’s horrific.
attributes.title: Ugh🙄🤦🏽‍♂️

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see if there was ANYTHING good about him. But as soon as I clicked on the app, it was like I stepped onto a communist platform. I also reminded myself that Trump is a racist bigot that has not made this country great again, it’s made it worse again.
attributes.title: Racists
